title: Update a Social Services Case File
description: A social worker needs to add a note to a client's case file after a home visit.

tasks.description: Identify the correct client case file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker successfully pulls up the client's record.

tasks.description: Draft a case note summarizing the home visit, including observations and any new actions planned.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker writes a clear, concise, and objective case note.

tasks.description: Save the note to the case file with the correct date and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker successfully adds the note to the official case record.
